attributes.action: investigate underground transport in UK to get to cities quicker and easier and to make rush hours better and avoid traffic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who thinks it would make travelling to cities via car easier if we had some sort of underground transport that only stopped off at cities?

This is an example of the plan:
London -> Cambridge -> Birmingham -> Liverpool or Manchester -> Blackpool -> York -> Newcastle
